english.segment1: Maybe we, Why don't we sit right here for half an hour. We'll speak of what a waste I am and how we missed your beat again
english.segment2: I swear we need to find some comfort in this run down place. To bridge the gap of this conscious state that we live in. I'm short on time
english.segment3: How come you try and fit the shape of what they tell you. But mostly what they show you. That brings us home. I pray for you to move on
english.segment4: At this rate we can't keep up but I sure can't just sit still. I'm taking back all the things I said. Keep me filled in, I swear I'll come
english.segment6: You're almost gone and I'm ok to give you time to be afraid. I still see your shadow but never your face again. I remember your presence
english.segment7: I hope to God you come down. I hope to God you can feel this now
english.segment8: I know there must be some way out of here and all of them will be. Waiting here.
